description.zh-cn: 清朝皇子，清高宗乾隆帝第十二子。生母为继皇后辉发那拉氏。因母亲失宠而受牵连，生前仅为闲散宗室，嘉庆四年被追封为多罗贝勒。
description.en: A prince of the Qing Dynasty, the 12th son of the Qianlong Emperor. His mother was Empress Hoifa-Nara. Implicated by his mother's fall from favor, he was only an imperial clansman without a title during his lifetime and was posthumously created a Doro Beile in the fourth year of the Jiaqing era.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，清军入关后的第四位皇帝，年号“乾隆”，永璂的父亲。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the fourth Qing emperor to rule over China proper. His era name was 'Qianlong'. He was the father of Yongqi.

description.zh-cn: 清高宗乾隆帝的第二任皇后，永璂的生母。
description.en: The second Empress Consort of the Qianlong Emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the biological mother of Yongqi.

description.zh-cn: 永璂的嫡福晋，出身于蒙古阿巴噶右旗。
description.en: The primary consort of Yongqi, from the Abaga Right Banner of Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 清高宗乾隆帝第十一子，永璂的兄长，以书法闻名。
description.en: The 11th son of the Qianlong Emperor and the elder brother of Yongqi, famous for his calligraphy.

description.zh-cn: 永瑆第四子，后过继给永璂为嗣子，并承袭多罗贝勒爵位。
description.en: The fourth son of Yongxing, who was later adopted as Yongqi's heir and inherited the title of Doro Beile.

description.zh-cn: 清代史学家、语言学家，曾被任命为皇十二子永璂的师傅。
description.en: A historian and linguist of the Qing Dynasty who was appointed as the tutor to the 12th Prince, Yongqi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝国姓及皇室宗族。
description.en: The imperial clan of the Manchu-led Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室成员中未获得爵位者的身份或阶层。
description.en: The status or class of members of the Qing imperial clan who had not been granted a noble title.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室爵位之一，位次多罗郡王，高于固山贝子。
description.en: A rank of nobility in the Qing dynasty, ranked below a Doro Junwang (Prince of the Second Rank) and above a Gushan Beizi (Prince of the Fourth Rank).

description.zh-cn: 清乾隆年间由官方主导编纂的满蒙文辞书。
description.en: A Manchu-Mongolian dictionary officially compiled during the Qianlong era of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 永璂的个人诗集，收集其平日所作诗词。
description.en: Yongqi's personal collection of poems, compiling his daily poetic works.

description.zh-cn: 永璂是弘历（乾隆帝）的第十二子。
description.en: Yongqi was the 12th son of Hongli (the Qianlong Emperor).

description.zh-cn: 永璂是清高宗继皇后辉发那拉氏的亲生儿子。
description.en: Yongqi was the biological son of Empress Hoifa-Nara, the Step Empress to the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 1765年南巡期间，因其母继皇后那拉氏剪发触怒乾隆帝，永璂受到牵连而失宠。
description.en: During the southern tour in 1765, Yongqi fell out of favor as he was implicated by his mother, Empress Nara, who angered the Qianlong Emperor by cutting her hair.

description.zh-cn: 在1765年南巡期间，继皇后那拉氏因剪发触怒乾隆帝，被收回皇后宝册并禁足。
description.en: During the southern tour in 1765, Empress Nara angered the Qianlong Emperor by cutting her hair, leading to the confiscation of her imperial titles and her confinement.

description.zh-cn: 永璂于乾隆三十五年四月与嫡福晋博尔济吉特氏成婚。
description.en: Yongqi married his primary consort, Lady Borjigit, in April 1770.

description.zh-cn: 永璂是乾隆帝第十二子，永瑆是第十一子，二人是异母兄弟。
description.en: Yongqi was the 12th son of the Qianlong Emperor, and Yongxing was the 11th son; they were half-brothers.

description.zh-cn: 绵偲是永瑆的第四子。
description.en: Miancai was the fourth son of Yongxing.

description.zh-cn: 绵偲在永璂去世后，于乾隆四十一年四月奉旨过继给永璂为嗣子。
description.en: After Yongqi's death, Miancai was designated as his adoptive son by imperial decree in April 1776.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆三十八年，钱大昕被任命为皇十二子师傅，为永璂讲学。
description.en: In 1773, Qian Daxin was appointed as the tutor to the 12th Prince, Yongqi.

description.zh-cn: 永璂是爱新觉罗氏宗族成员。
description.en: Yongqi was a member of the Aisin-Gioro clan.

description.zh-cn: 永璂在生前未获封爵，身份为闲散宗室。
description.en: During his lifetime, Yongqi was not granted a noble title and held the status of an imperial clansman without title.

description.zh-cn: 永璂于嘉庆四年（1799年）三月被追封为多罗贝勒。
description.en: Yongqi was posthumously granted the title of Doro Beile in March 1799.

description.zh-cn: 永璂曾担任《御制满蒙文鉴》总纲的首席编纂。
description.en: Yongqi served as the chief compiler for the general outline of the 'Imperial Manchu-Mongolian Dictionary'.

description.zh-cn: 永璂著有《日课诗稿》一书，收集其平日诗词。
description.en: Yongqi authored the 'Daily Poetry Collection', a compilation of his poems.
